wikipedia_page.main: Gregory Jasper Cruttwell (born 22 March 1960) is an English film maker and football manager. He is the son of actress Geraldine McEwan and Hugh Cruttwell, former principal of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art.

Balham Football Club was established in 2011 by Greg Cruttwell as an adult team for the Balham Blazers youth football club.1st Team Balham F.C. They joined Junior Division One of the Surrey South Eastern Combination, and after finishing fourth in their first season,Junior Division 1: League Table Surrey South Eastern Combination were promoted to Intermediate Division Two. In 2012–13 they finished third in Intermediate Division Two,Intermediate Division 2: League Table Surrey South Eastern Combination earning promotion to Intermediate Division One, which they won the following season.Intermediate Division 1: League Table Surrey South Eastern Combination
